name: Not That Happy Dream
description:
Youre playing a little girl having sweet dreams... or not. You'll have to fight Teddy Bears, Dolls and you'll have to survive 15 waves to succed. Good Luck!

Controls:
Movement: wasd or arrow keys
Jump/Fly: Space (mash space to fly)
Fire: Left Mouse or "F"
Pause: p

Game Created by:
Sébastien Feser
Adam Naji
Jade Coppex

Credits:
Main Level Music: Patrick de Arteaga (patrickdearteaga.com)
Game Over Music: Kim Lightyear
Cute Level Music & Victory Music : cynicmusic.com, pixelsphere.org

Please, write a comment if you liked or disliked the game
